• All new Heroic Event missions.
o Test your skill and strength in these challenging missions every day.
o Earn war gems to purchase powerful flamethrowers and even a tank!
o Steal crates from your enemies to find powerful equipme

• Take down enemy aircraft with the Ack Ack gun!
